name: Apocalypse zombie Race
description: This is a real rally with drift elements, while you have to fulfill the mission, shoot down the zombies on the machine. Overcome the hills, throw the car into a skid on the asphalt and feel the inexpressible drive from drift through the mud.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 4 Duo or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
